DOC.brief_summary: A phase III study evaluate Long term efficacy , carry-over effect safety 300 IR sublingual Immunotherapy ( SLIT ) tablet adults patient suffer grass pollen rhinoconjunctivitis
DOC.brief_title: Phase III Study Assess Long Term Efficacy , Carry-over Effect Safety 300 IR Sublingual Immunotherapy Tablets
DOC.criteria: Male female outpatient age 18 50 year Grass pollenrelated allergic rhinoconjunctivitis least last two pollen season Positive SPT specific IgE value least Class 2 grass pollen allergens A score great equal 12 possible 18 Retrospective Rhinoconjunctivitis Total Symptom Score ( RRTSS ) Patients symptoms rhinoconjunctivitis grass pollen season due sensitisation allergen grass pollen must include . Patients must asymptomatic allergen grass pollen season . Patients allergic rhinitis due perennial allergen may include . Asthma require treatment beta2 inhaled agonist . Patients receive desensitisation treatment grass pollen allergen within previous 5 year .
